review: Not really sure where to start...I don't have anything to compare it to except my PS4.  Sony has locked everything up so much that compared to my options on my PS4, this Fire TV Stick is amazing.  I paid $34 for it.  I put it in my kitchen.  I have a Samsung LED tv in there and this made it a smart tv on steroids.  Crazy apps...cooking channels...A&E;, History Channel, ESPN, Netflix, games..pretty sweet.  I bought a saltwater aquarium channel just to play around for $1 and it it looks real.  Loaded up right out of the box, had it online in like 5 minutes.  Only thing, and I'm sure this will come, would be to have my Echo talk to it.  Maybe it does, but I don't think so.  I told Alexa to discover devices and she didn't find it.  If you have any tv that isn't a smart tv, this thing is absolutely worth $34.  It's ridonkulous, as my kids would say.
